languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс кланяется.{/n} "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан. Я уверен, что это небольшое отклонение от основного курса позволит хотя бы немного сдержать распространение анархии в Просторе Коронус. По крайней мере, по нам не ударят с флангов".

{n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс кланяется.{/n} "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан. Я уверен, что это небольшое отклонение от основного курса позволит хотя бы немного сдержать распространение анархии в Просторе Коронус. По крайней мере, по нам не ударят с флангов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

{n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

{n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

{n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

languages.text: {n}海因里希鞠了一躬。{/n}“谢谢你，舰长大人。我相信，尽管我们稍稍偏离了主要航线，但这有助于阻止科罗努斯扩区的无政府状态继续扩散，哪怕只有一点点成效也好。至少这样一来，我们就不会面对腹背受敌的险境。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希鞠了一躬。{/n}“谢谢你，舰长大人。我相信，尽管我们稍稍偏离了主要航线，但这有助于阻止科罗努斯扩区的无政府状态继续扩散，哪怕只有一点点成效也好。至少这样一来，我们就不会面对腹背受敌的险境。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te dedica una reverencia.{/n} «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Estoy convencido de que este cambio menor de trayectoria nos ayudará a cortar la propagación de la anarquía por la Extensión de Koronus, aunque sea de forma limitada. Como mínimo, evitaremos que el enemigo nos flanquee».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te dedica una reverencia.{/n} «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Estoy convencido de que este cambio menor de trayectoria nos ayudará a cortar la propagación de la anarquía por la Extensión de Koronus, aunque sea de forma limitada. Como mínimo, evitaremos que el enemigo nos flanquee».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは頭を下げる。{/n}「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。本来の針路からのこの小さな逸脱が、たとえわずかであっても、コロヌス・エクスパンスにおける無政府状態の拡大を食い止めるのに役立つと確信しています。少なくとも、我らが出し抜かれることはありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは頭を下げる。{/n}「ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。本来の針路からのこの小さな逸脱が、たとえわずかであっても、コロヌス・エクスパンスにおける無政府状態の拡大を食い止めるのに役立つと確信しています。少なくとも、我らが出し抜かれることはありません」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'incline.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis persuadé que ce petit détour contribuera à freiner l'anarchie qui se propage dans les Étendues de Koronus, ne serait-ce qu'un peu. À tout le moins, nous ne serons pas pris à revers. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'incline.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis persuadé que ce petit détour contribuera à freiner l'anarchie qui se propage dans les Étendues de Koronus, ne serait-ce qu'un peu. À tout le moins, nous ne serons pas pris à revers. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verneigt sich.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain. Ich bin sicher, dieser kleine Umweg von unserem eigentlichen Kurs wird helfen, die Ausbreitung der Anarchie in der Koronus-Ausdehnung einzudämmen, wenn auch nur in geringem Ausmaß. Zumindest wird uns von dort niemand mehr in die Flanke fallen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix verneigt sich.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain. Ich bin sicher, dieser kleine Umweg von unserem eigentlichen Kurs wird helfen, die Ausbreitung der Anarchie in der Koronus-Ausdehnung einzudämmen, wenn auch nur in geringem Ausmaß. Zumindest wird uns von dort niemand mehr in die Flanke fallen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix başını eğiyor.{/n} "Teşekkürler Lord Kaptan. Öncelikli rotamızdan biraz sapmamız gerekse de bunun, Koronus Enginliği'nde anarşinin kök salmasını biraz olsun engelleyeceğine inancım tam. En azından beklenmedik bir yandan vurulma ihtimalimiz ortadan kalkacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix bows.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I am confident that this minor deviation from our primary course will help to stem the spread of anarchy in the Koronus Expanse, if only slightly. At the very least, we won't be outflanked."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix başını eğiyor.{/n} "Teşekkürler Lord Kaptan. Öncelikli rotamızdan biraz sapmamız gerekse de, bunun, Koronus Enginliği'nde anarşinin kök salmasını biraz olsun engelleyeceğine dair inancım tam. En azından beklenmedik bir kanattan vurulma ihtimalimizi ortadan kaldırır."
